author: Debbie Ait-Kaci
comment: Useless. Impossible to get it open.  I registered then it wouldn't let me in but took me to another registration screen in Italian. Then said my email was already registered.  I tried to log in again but it said I had put the wrong email/ password. Uninstalling

author: Alexandru Isfan
comment: The app sync with other sport apps works very slow and has small bugs. For example, I linked it with the Polar account and after I follow all the steps for that, it still shows them not connected in the linked accounts section. They are connected but it shows them like they are not. I accepted the invitation in my polar flow app.

author: Эдуард Шацкий
comment: Can't log in with Facebook account. If you offer that option, it should work. Personal opinion. Waste of time.

author: Joshua Turner
comment: Came up in spanish or some such. To input birth date I need to scroll back from todays date 1 month at a time. Total waste of time.

author: Wolfger Silberbaer
comment: App would not even let me in. Just hangs up on a blank loading screen after login.

author: Hiro K
comment: Waste of time. Cannot log in nor can you create account. App just doesn't work.

author: Elton Liu
comment: it used to work with my Condo Building's Kenesis Personal but now there's a lock symbol on it and the workouts dont work. i.e They don't load, just waiting amd waiting....? Help please!

author: Jill E
comment: Came up in a different language.  Don't know what was being asked.

author: Louis Halpern
comment: Amazingly bad.  Wouldn't even find eliptical machine netherlone nñb sync

author: Ice Cold Beard
comment: I need to learn italian to create an account.....something's wrong....uninstalled

author: Peyman Hessamfar
comment: It does not work properly with Android, Equipment cannot be shown in the app!!!!???

author: Loukas Karampogias
comment: Why do you need access to my contacts? 1star > uninstall

author: Nicola Delfino
comment: Dopo il login via Facebook, resta all'avvio in hang con Il cursore che ruota indefinita mente...

author: Siavash Sarrafan
comment: Doesn't sync with the machines, the primary application of this app as supposed to be so...

author: Emerson Najarro
comment: Work out never load up

author: David Martin
comment: Great app, but the app icon is way to big. Please fix this.☺

author: Patrick Stillhart
comment: why does it require a login?

author: Richard Cassidy
comment: Problems syncing

author: Marco Rinaldo
comment: The app doesn't work properly with samsung s7 after update. I can't see the details of the indoor cycling training because the app crash. Please solve the issue! It would be great to have the export of the indoor cycling training to Strava, it shouldn't be rocket science...

author: Tarwinder Saran
comment: TechnoGym equipment is excellent sadly their mobile Apps are not!!!  Waste of time.

author: Guillermo Orellana Ruiz
comment: Ffs stop messing up my Google fit stats, they all go to 0 at the end of the day if this app is connected

author: Andy Christensen
comment: Too many fitness apps that you sync to here.   I don't have TG equipment so... I work at the company.   The tracker is ok,  but that same as almost everyone else's.   The GPS is inaccurate,  the only app that has been accurate is one that was "discontinued"  cardiotrainer by noom, and it doesn't sync with this.   I now have so many apps for training on my phone and they all disappoint, yes even my wellness.   If you really want to measure movement then create an app that can seamlessly be used by all,
title: How many apps do you need to sync with one?

author: Tamsin Mavric
comment: Won't connect to any Technogym equipment at the gym.Useless!LifeFitness is so much better.Actually connects to LifeFitness equipment....Uninstalling this rotten app.For the 2nd time!!!!
title: Sucks

author: Paul Thompson
comment: When I save a workout as completed in MyWellness it syncs it across to Technogym app ok but then I get a notification in the top left area of my Samsung mobile which says 'Free Workout' but when I go to the notification it just shows a revolving circular line on a blank white screen...nothing happens even after several minutes. If I press on Clear notifications it won't go away. If I press and hold the notification, it shows it as Technogym. Any ideas?
title: Notifications

author: sdc shealth
comment: Love this

author: Julie grant
comment: I found that after a samsung software update technogym app doesnt work too good isnt counting steps as it should do is there a problem with the app

author: Antoinette Lansdell
comment: Whats the point having this app when i cant log the equipment im using at gym? Our entire gym is equipped with Technogym equipment but they arent in the app? This makes no sense at all...pls integrate your equipment!!
title: Equipment??

author: Anthony Dagostino
comment: I somehow logged the same workout twice and tried to delete one but can't seem to be able to.
title: Can you delete a workout?

author: Dee Broadley
comment: I have a chest band to measure my activity in the gym with the treadmills. Can I match it to this phone app
title: Deedee

author: Maksim Gorb
comment: New app is great except for it doesnt sync with the google fit, although it shows connected.
title: Google fit sync not working

author: Vivian Tang
comment: It has GoogleFit as a linked account option but exercises do not write to it.
title: Googlefit integration doesnt work

author: Gareth Liversedge
comment: Prefect for helping log and increase my moves
title: Ace app

author: L. A. Miller
comment: It was a great morning workout, with rotating workouts I could do in an apartment. It synched with shealth, tracked runs. And after the last updater it doesn't track me doing a workout, it freezes. Daily counts seem lower compared to shealth. Edit: reinstalled, created new account, still freezes but it knows I did workout. Still no move credit for workout. Freezes trying to update main screen most of time.
title: Loved it, then broke...

author: Nikola Bjelić
comment: The app is great but we need to be able to silence this annoying lady, and music as well, when not using earphones at least, I dont want music and her countdowns when i go for a walk

reply.author: Technogym SpA
reply.content:
Hi Nikola, 
Thank you for your feedback.

If you don't like audio info you can disable it. Just open the settings menu and then movement settings and turn voice off.
Doing so no audio voice will be played.

Team Technogym

title: Oh please shut this woman`s voice

author: Shafiul Alam
comment: Great app, but signing into the cloud on the treadmill etc is long and tedious. Maybe an NFC login system, or ID number would be quicker than typing out email addresses and passwords. Also how do you add things like chest press and total abdominal to the workout and moves
title: Needs to be easier to sync with equipment

author: Cecile Renaud
comment: Given that this is a Technogym app I was expecting something that would allow me to plan and preprogramme the Technogym equipment at my gym... I've been looking round the app and cannot find anything of the sort. Tried to send feedback and it froze the app.
title: Am I missing something?

author: Eno Beano
comment: Keeps accurate data
title: Technogym

author: Alan Parker
comment: Remove the adware and I'll re-rate your app. For now it earns a 1-star

reply.author: Technogym SpA
reply.content:
Dear Alan,
We do not have any adware so AVG is reporting you a wrong advice.

title: AVG detected adware in this app

author: Abdulrahman Ali
comment: So i was gonna give it a 5 star rating but something happend and  workouts wouldn't work
title: Workouts?

author: Rob Dixon
comment: A great app that has many features. Not sure on the honesty of some users as there are 10 year olds on the local leader board that clock up over 15,000 moves in a week.... Some going! Wonder how many moves are legitimate ;) I do my best anyway and this app is great to log your achievements at the gym.
title: Useful app
